channel.title: ~turning wildy sign into safe zone on 317~
channel.description:
hey guys, i picked a new home and got it rdy but when i go to my home it gives me thie wildy thing where you can be attacked does anybody know how to change the wildy area to a safe zone if so plzz tell me or send me to a tut or somehting
regards demno :)

item.title: ~turning wildy sign into safe zone on 317~
item.dc:creator: @I_AM_LEGEND I_AM_LEGEND
item.description:
@I_AM_LEGEND wrote:

if(nonWild()) { outStream.createFrame(208); outStream.writeWordBigEndian_dup(197); sendQuest("@gre@Safe", 199); }

find out were to put it[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 13, 2009, 04:07:06 pm[/size][hr]my bad misread what you posted

search for:

    public boolean nonWild()

and under you should see

 if ((absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <= 3431)

its like a T shape

longest side to side in X and shortest to long number in Y to Y if you get me
